subject: Order SSN3225
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,
I'd like to return this order, SSN3225. I thought that this pedal set might
be compatible with a Fanatec DD pro connected to a Playstation 5.
Apologies for my mistake.
Please let me know if you ever plan on an adapter to connect this awesome
pedal set to a Fanatec/Playstation 5.

Best Regards
-Ling Tong
38850 Altura St, Fremont, CA 94536

conversations.body_text:
Hi,
Is anybody viewing this support ticket?
I'm trying to initiate a product return but I have not heard anything.
This is in regards to order SSN3225

Best Regards,
=Ling Tong

On Mon, Nov 10, 2025 at 2:05 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Ling Kang Tong,    Are there any issues with your product?

Hi Simsonn, I thought this product would be compatible with my Fanatec wheelbase on a PlayStation 5. It’s not. Apologies, I should have researched this more before purchasing. Right now, it’s unusable with my setup and I would like to return it. It’s in brand new condition. I only opened the box to plug it into the fanatec to check compatibility. Best Regards -Ling Tong Sent from my iPhone

Hi Simsonn,
I'm checking in again. Can I return this product? It's still brand new in
the box condition.
Order SSN3225
Best Regards
-Ling Tong

Hi Ling Kang Tong,    We apologise for the delay in responding to your message. We shall arrange for your return. However, as the product is in perfect condition, our returns policy requires you to cover the shipping costs of approximately $30. We have now dispatched the return label to you. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Hi Simsonn,
Thank you for eventually getting back to me. Since the response was taking
so long (this request was initiated Nov 10th), I was able to find a local
buyer to sell my item to and I initiated a dispute with my card company.
I will go ahead and close the dispute with my credit card company since I
was able to find a local buyer. I will not be returning the product.
Best Regards,
Ling Tong

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 11:08 PM service@simsonn.com
